## Summary

Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the opportunity you're looking to address.  Provide context about how the new component would improve the user experience or developer workflow.

## Detailed description

- **Use case:** Explain when and why this component should be used.  Include screenshots or links to similar patterns in other design systems if applicable.
- **Functionality:** What functionality should the component include?  Consider interactive states, accessibility requirements and responsive behaviour.
- **Design considerations:** Describe how the component aligns with our design principles (clarity, simplicity, accessibility, etc.).  Note any specific styling needs or variants.
- **API design:** Suggest a rough prop API for the React component.  How will developers configure and extend it?

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched the existing issues and documentation and this component does not already exist.
- [ ] I have considered accessibility (keyboard navigation, screen reader support, colour contrast).
- [ ] I have provided sufficient context and examples to help the design system team evaluate this proposal.
